member.name: M:DEMSoft.Drawing.Object3D.SetColor(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Sets the color of this object. The color is specified by the rgb components of the color. The components must be in the range [0, 1]. For instance, pure red is defined by r=1, g=0 and b=0.
